blocklings.task.null.name: Blank
blocklings.task.null.desc: Click the configure button to set up this task.
blocklings.task.sit.name: Sit
blocklings.task.sit.desc: Your blockling will stay in their current location.
blocklings.task.follow.name: Follow
blocklings.task.follow.desc: Your blockling will closely follow you around.
blocklings.task.wander.name: Wander
blocklings.task.wander.desc: Your blockling will wander around randomly.
blocklings.task.hurt_by_melee.name: Retaliate
blocklings.task.hurt_by_melee.desc: Your blockling will attack their attacker with melee.
blocklings.task.owner_hurt_by_melee.name: Attack Owner's Attacker
blocklings.task.owner_hurt_by_melee.desc: Your blockling will attack your attacker with melee.
blocklings.task.owner_hurt_melee.name: Attack Owner's Target
blocklings.task.owner_hurt_melee.desc: Your blockling will attack your target with melee.
blocklings.task.hunt_melee.name: Hunt
blocklings.task.hunt_melee.desc: Your blockling will attack nearby creatures with melee and collect their drops.
blocklings.task.mine_ores.name: Mine Ores
blocklings.task.mine_ores.desc: Your blockling will mine nearby ores if they have a pickaxe equipped.
blocklings.task.chop_trees.name: Chop Trees
blocklings.task.chop_trees.desc: Your blockling will chop nearby trees if they have an axe equipped.
blocklings.task.farm_crops.name: Farm Crops
blocklings.task.farm_crops.desc: Your blockling will farm nearby crops if they have a hoe equipped.
blocklings.skill.buy_confirmation: Are you sure you want to unlock %s?
blocklings.skill.name: Skill
blocklings.skill.general.heal.name: Heal
blocklings.skill.general.heal.desc: Right-click on your blockling with flowers or their respective type items to heal 3-5 health.
blocklings.skill.general.packling.name: Packling
blocklings.skill.general.packling.desc: Crouch and right-click with flowers or their respective type items to pick up your blockling in item form.
blocklings.skill.general.armadillo.name: Armadillo
blocklings.skill.general.armadillo.desc: Your blockling will drop in item form instead of dying.
blocklings.skill.general.speed_1.name: Speedy
blocklings.skill.general.speed_2.name: Speedier
blocklings.skill.general.speed_3.name: Speediest
blocklings.skill.general.autoswitch.name: Autoswitch
blocklings.skill.general.autoswitch.desc: Your blockling will switch to the best tools they have for their current task.
blocklings.skill.combat.novice_guard.des: Unlocks the "Attack Owner''s Attacker" and "Attack Owner''s Target" tasks.
blocklings.skill.combat.whitelist.name: Target Whitelist
blocklings.skill.combat.whitelist.desc: Unlocks the target whitelist for combat tasks.
blocklings.skill.combat.sharpness.name: Sharpness
blocklings.skill.combat.berserker.name: Berserker
blocklings.skill.combat.berserker.desc: The lower your blockling's health, the more damage they will do.
blocklings.skill.combat.momentum.name: Momentum
blocklings.skill.combat.momentum.desc: Your blockling attacks faster for each attack within 5 seconds.
blocklings.skill.combat.wreckless.name: Wreckless
blocklings.skill.combat.wreckless.desc: Your blockling hits harder but their weapons use 2x the durability.
blocklings.skill.combat.photophile.name: Photophile
blocklings.skill.combat.photophile.desc: Your blockling attacks faster the higher the light level.
blocklings.skill.combat.regeneration_1.d: Your blockling will heal 1 health every 20 seconds.
blocklings.skill.combat.regeneration_2.d: Your blockling will heal 3 health every 20 seconds.
blocklings.skill.combat.regeneration_3.d: Your blockling will heal 5 health every 20 seconds.
blocklings.skill.combat.hunter.name: Hunter
blocklings.skill.combat.animal_hunter.de: Your blockling receives double the loot from animals when hunting.
blocklings.skill.combat.monster_hunter.d: Your blockling receives double the loot from monsters when hunting.
blocklings.skill.mining.whitelist.name: Ore Whitelist
blocklings.skill.mining.whitelist.desc: Unlocks the ore whitelist for the "Mine Ores" task.
blocklings.skill.mining.efficiency.name: Efficiency
blocklings.skill.mining.adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
blocklings.skill.mining.adrenaline.desc: The lower your blockling's health, the faster they will mine.
blocklings.skill.mining.momentum.name: Momentum
blocklings.skill.mining.momentum.desc: Your blockling mines faster for each ore mined within 5 seconds.
blocklings.skill.mining.hasty.name: Hasty
blocklings.skill.mining.hasty.desc: Your blockling mines faster but their pickaxes use 2x the durability.
blocklings.skill.mining.night_owl.name: Night Owl
blocklings.skill.mining.night_owl.desc: Your blockling mines faster the lower the light level.
blocklings.skill.mining.hot_hands.name: Hot Hands
blocklings.skill.mining.hot_hands.desc: Your blockling's hands are so hot they seem to smelt the ores they mine.
blocklings.skill.mining.hammer.name: Hammer
blocklings.skill.mining.hammer.desc: Your blockling mines ores in a 3x3x3 area.
blocklings.skill.woodcutting.whitelist.d: Unlocks the log whitelist for the "Chop Trees" task.
The lower your blockling's health, the faster they will chop.
blocklings.skill.woodcutting.momentum.de: Your blockling chops faster for each log chopped within 5 seconds.
blocklings.skill.woodcutting.hasty.name: Hasty
blocklings.skill.woodcutting.hasty.desc: Your blockling chops faster but their axes use 2x the durability.
blocklings.skill.woodcutting.night_owl.d: Your blockling chops faster the lower the light level.
blocklings.skill.woodcutting.leaf_blower: Your blockling will break adjacent leaves when chopping logs.
blocklings.skill.woodcutting.tree_surgeo: Broken leaves will now drop items.
blocklings.skill.woodcutting.replanter.d: Your blockling will replant the trees they cut if they have the saplings.
Your blockling chops logs in a 3x3x3 area.
Unlocks the crop whitelist for the "Farm Crops" task.
blocklings.skill.farming.efficiency.name: Efficiency
blocklings.skill.farming.replanter.name: Replanter
blocklings.skill.farming.replanter.desc: Unlocks the ability for your blockling to replant the crops they harvest.
Unlocks the seed whitelist for the "Farm Crops" task.
blocklings.skill.farming.adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
blocklings.skill.farming.adrenaline.desc: The lower your blockling's health, the faster they will harvest.
blocklings.skill.farming.momentum.name: Momentum
blocklings.skill.farming.momentum.desc: Your blockling harvests faster for each crop harvested within 5 seconds.
blocklings.skill.farming.hasty.name: Hasty
blocklings.skill.farming.hasty.desc: Your blockling harvests faster but their hoes use 2x the durability.
blocklings.skill.farming.night_owl.name: Night Owl
blocklings.skill.farming.night_owl.desc: Your blockling harvests faster the lower the light level.
blocklings.skill.farming.scythe.name: Scythe
blocklings.skill.farming.scythe.desc: Your blockling farms crops in a 3x3x3 area.
